title: Mobile Microlearning Course for STEM Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic STEM concepts and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program Combining Language Education and STEM Projects for Current Elementary Education Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain STEM problem-solving design processes with 80% accuracy using PBL (Project-Based Learning) methodology
Learners can independently plan and execute language-domain STEM projects three or more times using virtual internship tools
Learners improve problem-solving strategies with over 90% participation rates by utilizing digital feedback systems during collaborative processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
